body: Is the cover just an illustration? Is it not in the collection? Who's the artist?
It's been years that no translation for Millefeuille manga.

Kawazuko CHouji's work is getting more and more creepy lol. Now we got an old man disguised as a grandma to lure girls in to rape and torture them. Now I wish more of his work would be translated so I can actually understand whats going on.

GRANDMA WITH A DICK !!!
this will be a nightmare for me this entire month..
